meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of diseases and disorders of the urinary tract and male reproductive system.
meanings.sent1: The urologist helped Mr. Smith with his kidney problem.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the urologist next week.
meanings.sent3: The urologist joked that he had a 'pee-sitive' outlook on his patients' health.
meanings.sent4: The urologist is like a detective investigating issues in the urinary system.
meanings.sent5: When you need help down there, the urologist is the one to see.
